work-0.title: The project
text: The project consists to create my own portfolio of my skill level and tell what about me
This portfolio will show you what project i did and what i learned
Every projects have a website who present itself what about and the documentation. This portfolio will have redirection buttons to these other sites

work-1.title: The project
text: The project consists to create an entire PHP web framework

work-1.title: Features
text: Automatic commands to generate files (like : skillio create View -name Home)
Basic auto Verifications for a sended form with options
Command witch generate automatically the connection and inscription back/front-end
Create a complete form with a php code from the core wich is automatically secured
Template engine for this framewok with new tags (for, foreach, forerror, if, while, debug)

work-3.title: The project
text: The project consists to create an application to manage github repositories
The application scan files and folders on a specific emplacement and display it
With it, we can be able to create, clone, pull, push repositories and more

work-3.title: Features
text: Manage a repository (include push, pull, commit, etc...)
View files and folder of a repository
Open any IDE from the application
Use an in-application text editor (in-app IDE)
Connect to github to manage distant repositories and see more informations from them

work-8.title: The project
text: The project consists of creating a discord bot which manage channels

The principal utility of this bot is to create private categories for someone hwo can invite his friends in. he will have acces to a voice channel and a text channel. He can also close this category when he wants and automatically when leaving the voice channel

work-8.title: Features
text: Auto-create a voice channel with the name you want
When user entered this channel, the bot will create a category with the name of the creator and will be automatically
move on his own voice channel
The user can use commands on his channel (commands of this bot)
Close/Open the channel for everyone/some people

work-9.title: The project
text: The project consists to create a game launcher with my own games
Games can be installed/uninstalled, launched, from the application and you can have an account to save datas and play LAN with friend (hamachi for exemple)

work-10.title: The project
text: The project consists to re-create the classic dino game which launched when connection lost in console
The datas are saved in local and the game can be downloaded from the launcher

work-11.title: The project
text: The project consists to create a turn by turn game that can be play in PVE or PVP
You can create account to save your progression (launcher account). You will be able to dowload and launch the game from the launcher

work-12.title: The project
text: The project consists to create a turn by turn game that can be play in PVE or PVP. You can create/login account to save your progression (launcher account). You will be able to dowload and launch the game from the launcher
There are 1v1 and 2v2 games that are based on a procedural map wich create during the start of the match
Every player has three main characters per game, an HQ (Headquarter) and some classic units
The principle of the game is to destroy the ennemy HQ using the formed units
Main characters are the principal troops (the strongest of the game)
Classic units are character which can be created using the money generated during the round
they can be created with a military base (Builders base, Naval Base, Air Base and Land Base). At the start, only the land base and builders base are unlocked
You can build up to 3 land base, find randomly the naval bases and take possession of the only air base placed at the middle of the map
Every characters have life, damages, shoot distance, power.s and moves

Builders (you can have a maximum of 3 builders) can repair, upgrade or take possession of some bases, but be careful, they can be killed before getting the possession of the base. A builder can repair a base in 4 turns unlike taking possesion which takes only 2 turns (can be adjusted). If a builder dies, The only possibility of having one again is to form a new at the Builders base
Other units can be created using the conquested bases.

work-18.title: The project
text: The project consists to create a minecraft plugin for server to manage it
The server users who have permission to manage plugins can use commands
The plugin can manage many things like :
